properties.displayName: Hide Schedule Task Via Index Value Tamper
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000000)" and (RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree" and RegistryKey contains "Index")

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects when the "index" value of a scheduled task is modified from the registry
Which effectively hides it from any tooling such as "schtasks /query" (Read the referenced link for more information about the effects of this technique)
